com.swirlds.platform

Class Console

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.swirlds.platform.Console

  • public class Console
extends java.lang.Object
    A console window. It is similar to the one written to by System.out. The window has the size/location recommended by the browser, and contains scrolling white text on a black background. If cons is a Console, then it can be written to with cons.out.print() and cons.out.println() in the same way as the System print() and println() write to the Java console.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      java.io.PrintStream out
      Use out to write to this console window in the same way that System.out is used to write to Java's console window.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addKeyListener(java.awt.event.KeyListener listener)
      Adds the specified key listener to receive key events from this console.
      int getNumRows()
      Get the number of rows of text visible, given the current size of the window.
      void setHeading(java.lang.String headingText)
      put the given text at the top of the console, above the region that scrolls
